title: One Piece Bounty System - Novel Updates

description: Introduction to One Piece's Bounty System: Tianlei crossed the One Piece World and become the nephew of the Navy Admiral 'Sakazuki, 'Akainu', Tian Lei thought it was very outrageous until he found himself having a [bounty system] that can be exchanged for everything in the world of One Piece. As long as you kill or capture pirates, you can draw a Skills, weapons, and devil fruits. Such as 'Navy Six-style' 'Overlord color Haki (Busoshoku Haki)' 'sense color Haki (Kenbunshoku Haki) ''armed color Haki' 'devil fruit' 'sword skills' have everything!>
